Below is a complete HTML page with embedded CSS and JavaScript to create an interactive decision-making tool for uterine fibroids treatment based on the provided clinical guidelines. The page features a two-column layout with a dropdown to select clinical context and dynamically updated guidance based on user input. ```html Uterine Fibroids Treatment Decision Guide

Select Clinical Context:

Guidance

Please select a clinical context and answer the questions to receive guidance.
``` This HTML page includes: - A two-column layout with a dropdown for selecting the clinical context. - Dynamic display of questions based on the selected context. - JavaScript functions to update the guidance text based on user input. - Basic CSS for layout and styling. Ensure to test the page in different browsers and devices for compatibility and responsive behavior. Adjust the CSS as needed to match specific design requirements or to enhance accessibility.
